Name: The Keg Steakhouse + Bar - Calgary 4th Ave
Description: The Keg Steakhouse & Bar serves the finest cuts of succulent steak, aged for tenderness and grilled to perfection. Prime rib is a Keg speciality, slow roasted, hand carved and perfectly seasoned with special Keg spices. The restaurant also serves delicious seafood, memorable appetizers, crisp salads, and decadent desserts. A casual ambiance and friendly, very knowledgeable staff are proud and reliable trademarks of The Keg Steakhouse & Bar. You'll find a truly comfortable and satisfying dining atmosphere accompanied by a fun and up-scale bar setting where guests can enjoy an excellent wine list, signature Keg martinis, and fresh squeezed juice cocktails.

Name: The Guild
Description: The Guild exemplifies a new and exciting take on the finest traditions of butchery, cookery and bar-keeping. The name is inspired by guild halls from the past, which served as a meeting places and secret societies for artists and merchants. Honouring local beef, game and fowl, and utilizing traditional cooking techniques over wood and coal, The Guild chefs are preparing a fitting homage to proud Canadian carnivores.

Name: Vintage Chophouse & Tavern
Description: Vintage Chophouse is a classic steakhouse with contemporary flair, offering a compelling menu for the true steak lover combined with internationally diverse choices for those with something else in mind. Our award winning wine list features more than 600 wines from around the world. With five different rooms, Vintage offers something for every occasion, featuring our signature Beringer Room with a hi-top circular table ideal for intimate gatherings of 8 - 12 in a semi-private room. Enjoy our contemporary yet comfortable dining room, or relax in our New York style tavern. Overstuffed leather club chairs, or our intimate leather booths are the perfect place from which to catch the game on two 55" LCD televisions. We are the proud recipient of Wine Spectator Awards since 2005. Since 2007 Wine Spectator has honoured Vintage Chophouse and Tavern with the Best of Award of Excellence

Name: The Wednesday Room
Description: The Wednesday Room is a chef-driven lounge with the ultimate mid-century vibe. Won't you meet us on Wednesday?

Name: Pampa Brazilian Steakhouse Calgary Downtown
Description: Pampa is proud to be a truly authentic Southern Brazilian Steakhouse.Our authentic team of Gaucho Chefs will prepare the Southern Brazilian traditional "Churrasco" recipes on a daily basis for you. Our traditional cooking methods, the freshest of ingredients and stylish yet authentic presentation promise a unique gourmet experience.Pampa is the perfect place for your business meetings, family gatherings and special celebrations. Indulge in our extensive wine list, feature drinks and exquisite desserts.Pampa will provide you an unique experience, truly authentic food and excellent service.

Name: Klein / Harris
Description: **Announcement** We've moved back into our original location at 110 8th Avenue SW!KLEIN / HARRIS is an independent restaurant concept, inspired from the diverse bounty that Canada has to offer. Located in downtown Calgary on Stephen Avenue, KLEIN / HARRIS highlights the stories of passionate Canadian producers with the use of exceptional products and ingredients. Working with a long list of national heroes that make True North Cuisine possible, Executive Chef James Waters focuses on distinct coast-to-coast Canadian dishes; a culinary journey that begins in the West to eventually end on the East Coast, highlighting ingredients like wild seasonal mushrooms from British Columbia and fresh notable oysters from The Mari-times.

Name: The Palomino Smokehouse
Description:
Barbecue season never ends at the Palomino Smokehouse!! Situated in the heart of downtown Calgary with the largest smoker in Western Canada. All of our meats are smoked low and slow everyday as we go through pounds of BBQ classics such as Beef Brisket, Pulled Pork and Ribs. Our Smoked Chicken, New Orleans style Catfish Po'boy, award winning Chili and rib-sticking Macaroni & Cheese are also extremely popular with the locals.

All of our BBQ sauces (House, Chipotle and Carolina Mustard) and Rubs are made in-house and are gluten free. On weekends we feature the famous Cowboy Brunch, our BBQ-inspired take on breakfast classics which are available for both early and not-so-early risers.

We feature a large selection of beer, whiskey, bourbon and other spirits to quench your thirst.

Name: National on 10th
Description: Coming Soon! A great restaurant. Looking forward to serving you.

Name: The Bank and Baron Pub
Description: We welcome you to The Bank & Baron, reclaimed within The Bank of Nova Scotia building, which is recognized among one of Alberta's most historical. This grand space has been unlocked and a new downtown landmark awaits you.The Bank and Baron is located in the heart of Calgary's infamous Stephen Avenue, the pulse of downtown. This avenue was named after George Stephen, 1st Baron Mount Stephen. He was the financial genius behind the creation of the Canadian Pacific Railway, the President of the Bank of Montreal and is remembered as one of the greatest philanthropists of his time. In honor of the significant history Baron Mount Stephen imparted into the fostering of Calgary's culture , we have brewed The Bank & Baron P.U.B.The Bank & Baron is a place where a Traditional Public Urban Bar taps into a historical avenue destination. Crafting any event from a momentous occasion to an exquisite celebration can be effortlessly drafted.

Name: Thomsons Kitchen & Bar
Description: Formerly known as the Sandstone Lounge, Thomsons Kitchen & Bar has been redefined as a destination for casual dining and after-work drinks. Guests can look forward to a menu offering authentic Canadian dishes prepared in a modern way and a stylish bar serving a well-curated selection of wines, local beers and specialty cocktails.

Name: Koi
Description: Koi has been a consistent member of the arts and music scene in Calgary for over a decade, and continues to grow as an integral part of the cityâs culture.  With exciting events, a great rotation of local visual artists, fresh in-house created cocktails and an elevated new Asian-fusion menu, this hip spot is breaking ground to bring you new experiences on the regular. A beacon to Calgaryâs growing music scene, Koi remains one of downtown Calgaryâs best restaurant bars to take in live sessions. Enjoy a blended cuisine inspired by the best food out of China, Korea and Japan with a plethora of vegetarian, vegan, gluten free and allergen friendly options.  If you like a cocktail with your show, you will be blown away by the innovative creations from the bar.  There is certainly a little something for everyone.  Immerse yourself in an intimate and passionate atmosphere flavoured for the Calgary arts scene.

Name: Original Joe's - Stephen Ave
Description: Our first restaurant & bar opened in Marda Loop, Calgary, & even way back in 1997, it was comfortable, accessible & affordable. From the very beginning, Original Joeâs fell in step with exactly what it has always been about. A down-to-earth, down the street experience for all.We never take ourselves too seriously. We love good food experienced in the company of true friends, in an atmosphere that fits us like a well-worn pair of jeans. It feels real here & thatâs just fine by us. No pretense. No frou-frou. Just craft beers, approachable wines & tried-and-true cocktails. All served up with the kind of fresh-made comfort food you crave again & again. To this day we still hand cut our fries, serve most of our entrÃ©es with two sides & pour our own Original Joeâs beer.  So, come sit at our bar without having to lowers yours.

Name: OWL Patio & Bar
Description: The Westin Calgaryâs iconic 1960s fine dining restaurant, The Owlâs Nest reinvents itself with a pop-up outdoor modern twist introducing: Owl Patio & Bar. The outdoor patio offers an energetic atmosphere, making this casual eatery perfect for soaking up some Calgary sunshine while enjoying appetizing food and beverages. Curated by Chef Michael Batke, the menu offers classic lounge fare including delicious appetizers, flatbread pizzas, and handhelds. With summer here, locals and travelers can cool off with a signature cocktail or with local craft beers, ciders, fine wines, and Owlâs very own Owl Bar Lager by Railyard Brewing.

Name: Bridgette Bar
Description: Open Monday - Sunday in the heart of Calgary's Design District. Bridgette Bar is a chef-driven bar featuring Chef JP Pedhirney's ambitious menu. Lunch, happy hour, dinner and late nights in a mid-century modern setting.

Name: Sensei Bar
Description: A Chef-Driven Bar where boozy cocktails & sake flow to old-school beats, and a modern and rebellious take on Asian eats, serve up good times with mastery. Tucked away a stride from 17th Avenueâs nightlife, our intimate and urban space welcomes you all night and late-night. Our little-but-loud menu puts a boldly flavourful, yet nourishing spin on Korean and Taiwanese bites - all starring local ingredients and the beloved bao bun. Pair it with our curated cocktails, sake and bow down to the bao with your inner Sensei.

Name: Lulu Bar
Description: Lulu Bar is an escape from the ordinary. Its welcoming vibe is reminiscent of hidden gems from your last vacation, only better because itâs right here in your own backyard. With a healthy, Pacific-inspired menu, Luluâs wood-fired food is light and fresh â but heavy on flavour.Chef Joseph Sokoloffâs fare is a tribute to the Pacific Ocean and many of the regions that touch it, with influences from Asia to Hawaii, California to British Columbia. Luluâs fun, light, and refreshing drink menu is equally well-travelled. Its sake, beer, and creative cocktail offerings will make you feel like youâre far from home â and we like that.

Name: Gyu-Kaku - Calgary, AB
Description: We are open for limited dine-in service.We have updated our operations in accordance with all government guidelines to put your health and safety first.To maintain a safe environment for you and Gyu-Kaku staff, we ask that all guests understand and adhere to the following:- Masks are recommended- There may be limits on party sizes.- We are serving a limited menu. Not all Grand Menu items will be available during our immediate reopening.- We only accept payment via credit, debit card and cash.- There is a automatic service charge of 18%  on parties of 6 or more

Name: MODERN STEAK on Stephen Avenue
Description: Four key pieces separate us from a traditional steakhouse.1) We only serve ranch specific Alberta Beef. That means we donât serve beef from anywhere else on the planet. We know our farmers and ranchers personally and respect the hard work they put into produce our beef. We like our beef to be, hormone & antibiotic free and pasture raised. Happy cattle make for better steaks. 2) We are one of just a handful of steakhouses in Canada that serves, Grass-fed, Grain-fed, Wet-aged, Dry-aged and Wagyu beef 365 days a year. Our beef is always fresh never frozen.3) We use an 1800o Infrared Grill to cook your steaks. Our grill stays at very consistent high heat versus a traditional open flame grill. The high heat creates a flavourful crust on outside of the steak and leaves a juicy centre.4) Our dÃ©cor is warm and modern. The tradition has always been dark wood, leathers and a muted palate for a steakhouse. We broke the mold and decided to add hand selected music that reflects us!

Name: ANEJO Restaurant
Description: The Face of 4th StreetAÃ±ejo - A stunning multi-level sky-lit room, inspired & interactive Mexican cuisine, Canada's largest tequila selection, and Calgaryâs best margarita.Fresh, locally grown ingredients, cooked to perfection in Mexican style with a flair for contemporary flavours. Vibrant, boisterous, and bold.  The province of Jalisco is the inspiration behind our Fresh Ceviche, handcrafted Margaritas, Para la Mesa Guacamole, and Molcajete Bowls; both prepared in traditional lava-rock mortar.Open daily at 11AM - we offer lunch until 3PM daily, featuring the "Speedy Gonzales" lunch combo. Our famous #halfyhour is 3PM - 5PM and 9PM-close daily - all tacos & tequila are half price and all margaritas and beers are $6.Tequila - The finest, & possibly most misunderstood spirit in the world. All of our carefully selected tequilas are made with 100% Blue Weber agave.

Name: Pigeonhole
Description: All day drinking and dining from 11:00am-11:00pm. One menu for lunch, dinner and late night.

Name: Milestones Grill + Bar - Calgary - Stephen Avenue
Description: Patio seating is available at a first come first serve basis. We do not accept reservations for the patio at this time.You can always give us a call ahead of time to inquire about space available! 403-410-9521The classics you love prepared with a perfect twist, all served up in an atmosphere that feels just right. Thatâs the Milestones promise. So, whether youâre celebrating a milestone, making the most of Happy Hour or enjoying brunch with friends, you can be sure that every Milestones experience is a simple and perfectly memorable one.

Name: charbar
Address: Simmons Building, 618 Confluence Way SE, Calgary, AB T2G 0G1
Description: Located in East Village and housed in the historical Simmons Building along the Bow River, charbar is spearheaded by executive chef Jessica Pelland with the support of co-owners and Top Chef chefs Connie DeSousa and John Jackson. One of Canadas best restaurants partners with Sidewalk Citizen Bakery and Phil & Sebastian Coffee Roasters to create a collaborative and communal destination. Charbar restaurant features cuts of ultra-dry aged Alberta beef and an ocean wise seafood raw bar, that spills out onto the open air riverfront patios with views of the bow river. At its heart is a custom-made Argentine wood-fired grill honouring the art of asado and the culinary inspirations of Spain and Italy.

Name: Cardinale
Description: Cardinale - An Italian Joint located in Victoria Park.  Hand-crafted cocktail, fresh pasta, locally sourced meats & produce paired with fine wine.

Name: Yellow Door Bistro
Description: A bright, airy space full of surprises, Yellow Door offers creative dishes in a whimsical, approachable style. Come for the culinary splendour. Stay for the unconventional charm.Serving our weekday breakfast buffet, lunch, dinner and weekend brunch buffet, Yellow Door Bistro believes in elevating simple food with quality ingredients. Come join us for the "Appiest" of Hours daily in Yellow Door between 4pm - 6pm and enjoy amazing food and drink specials!FREE PARKING â Our guests receive complimentary self-parking at Hotel Arts in both above ground surface lot and heated underground parkade.

Name: Pulcinella
Address: 1147 Kensington Crescent NW, Calgary, AB T2N 1X7
Description: Executive Chef Domenic Tudda spent his childhood years learning of Italian cuisine while his family owned and operated Stromboli's restaurant in Calgary. He furthered his education by undergoing extensive culinary training in Italy and has been able to continue his parent's legacy of bringing unique and incredibly authentic Italian dining to Calgarians.  One of the most revered of these ventures is Ristorante Pulcinella, where Domenic first earned distinction when his international training crossed borders and entered Calgary in the spring of 2006. One of the few APN (Associazione Pizzaioli Napolitani) certified pizzerias in the world, Domenic has been able to showcase his culinary skills, incredible wine knowledge, and passion for Italian cuisine to provide Calgary with a truly artistic, original and delicious experience not soon to be forgotten. Certainly not your classical North American pizza, it's definitely different, but definitely delicious.

Name: Posto Pizzeria and Bar
Description: Life is too short to eat ordinary pizza! We like to drink great wine, sometimes lots of it. Most importantly, we like to share these passions with our friends.Our menu is Italian inspired and stacked with delicious food. Try a few of our smaller items or feast on a selection of pizzas and larger plates. Itâs up to you. We believe food is meant to be shared and encourage family style dining as we send dishes out once they are prepared. Conversation comes naturally when people enjoy food together.

Name: Blanco Cantina â Calgary Kensington
Address: 1140 Kensington Rd NW, Calgary, AB T2N 3P3
Description: Offering casual dining for big appetites, over-the-top cocktails, and the hottest happy hour in the city (we call it #halfyhour) from 2-5pm and 9pm - close daily; we offer a mixture of semi-private booth seating, intimate lower seating around our perimeter and a cozy lounge where the energy is always high. Come see our indoor-outdoor bar seating and 40+ seat patio, itâs a one-of-a-kind in Kensington! Blanco Cantina is the ultimate central spot for socializing and watching the game - we are always down to fiesta, whether you grab a quick bite or stay all night. Our tequila & spirits collection is off the hook, with over 100 hand-selected choices. We believe nachos should be as individual as you are, so build your own! We love brunch (ahem, day drinking) so join us weekend & holiday from 11am - 3pm. We have classic margaritas on the rocks, slushy concoctions, and a fun selection of feature cocktails & drinks.

Name: The Living Room Restaurant
Description: Come join us on our newly enclosed patio, rain or shine you can enjoy our contemporary cuisine, including fondues, some of our 20 year menu favorites, and of course a few shafts!

Name: Carino
Description: Carino is an Japanese and Italian fusion restaurant located in the Mission neighborhood in Calgary Canada.  Japanese taste with Italian twist and vice versa.

Name: Buchanan's Chop House and Whisky Bar
Description:
For almost thirty years, Buchananâs Chop House and Whisky Bar has served contemporary food in a classic Calgary room.

Michael and Carol Buchanan opened this neighbourhood icon in 1988, and the result is a family run, West Coast style restaurant that is true to the Chop house tradition. Buchananâs proudly serves Alberta beef, pastas, soups and sauces â all made from scratch. In the grand tradition of the chop house, they are proud to offer fresh fish, chowder, a world-class wine list, and one of Canadaâs most extensive whisky lists to round out your experience.

Name: National on 17th
Description: National opened its doors at 550 17th Ave. on June 1st, 2012. Providing Calgary with a new, dynamic choice in the growing craft beer market. Serving the best North American Craft Beer alongside Canadian Cuisine. National prides itself on creating a family environment for the staff, and a welcoming, comfortable atmosphere for our guests. We have worked extensively on our food program, paying special attention to our pizza program. Please join us inside to watch the game, or outside to enjoy our wrap-around patio looking out onto lively 17th  Ave.

Name: Vin Room Mission
Description: Open for contactless curbside pick up , delivery and patio (weather permitting) from 12-9 pm daily.We are located at 2310-4th St. SW (Old Mission Cycle Building)  Our rooftop patio is one of Open Table's top 100 outdoor dining restaurants in Canada, on a first come, first served basis.   Our wines are complemented by our tapas menu, focusing on fresh, local ingredients with a global twist. We offer tapas that are seasonal, wine focused and flavorful. Our Front patio is dog friendly seven days a week.   We offer complimentary dog beds, amenities station, dog bar and  complimentary fur baby fare for your furry friend.  For those who prefer the company of humans, our rooftop patio remains humans only.

Name: 1886 Buffalo Cafe
Address: 255 Barclay Parade SW, Calgary, AB T2P 5C2
Description: 1886 Buffalo is our family business that we have owned and operated for over 40 years.  We take pride in celebrating Calgary's history while serving home-style comfort dishes that are made with high quality ingredients that we strive to get from local artisans.  We are famous for our signature homestyle hashbrowns and our all-in breakfast poutine but let's be honest - we ... (67 KB left)
